Notes.Text:
roundcubemail was updated to version 1.0.6 to fix many minor bugs and three security issues.

The following vulnerabilities were fixed:

* CVE-2015-2180: security improvement in DBMail driver of password plugin (shell execution)
* CVE-2015-2181: security improvement in DBMail driver of password plugin (multiple buffer overflows)
* security improvement in contact photo handling
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: The DBMail driver in the Password plugin in Roundcube before 1.1.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the password.
Multiple buffer overflows in the DBMail driver in the Password plugin in Roundcube before 1.1.0 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via the (1) password or (2) username.
